00025 // main system configuration

00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';

00032 // page title
00033 $page_title = 'Item List';
00034 // get id from url
00035 $biblioID = 0;
00036 if (isset($_GET['biblioID']) AND !empty($_GET['biblioID'])) {
00037     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00038 }
00039 
00040 // start the output buffer
00041 ob_start();
00042 // iframe blocker
00043 if (isset($_GET['block'])) {
00044     echo '<div id="blocker" style="position: fixed; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #CCCCCC; opacity: 0.3;">&nbsp;</div>';

00047 <script type="text/javascript">
00048 function confirmProcess(int_biblio_id, int_item_id)
00049 {
00050     var confirmBox = confirm('Are you sure to remove selected item?' + "\n" + 'Once deleted, it can\'t be restored!');
00051     if (confirmBox) {
00052         // set hidden element value
00053         document.hiddenActionForm.bid.value = int_biblio_id;
00054         document.hiddenActionForm.remove.value = int_item_id;
00055         // submit form
00056         document.hiddenActionForm.submit();
00057     }
00058 }
00059 </script>
00060 <?php
00061 /* main content */
00062 if (isset($_POST['remove'])) {
00063     $id = (integer)$_POST['remove'];
00064     $bid = (integer)$_POST['bid'];
00065     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00066     // check if the item still on loan
00067     $loan_q = $dbs->query('SELECT DISTINCT l.item_code, b.title FROM loan AS l
00068         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00069         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00070         WHERE i.item_id='.$id.' AND l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0');
00071     $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00072     // send an alert if the member cant be deleted
00073     if ($loan_q->num_rows > 0) {
00074         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00075         echo 'alert(\''.__('Item data can not be deleted because still on hold by members').'\');';
00076         echo 'self.location.href = \'iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$bid.'\';';
00077         echo '</script>';
00078     } else {
00079         if ($sql_op->delete('item', 'item_id='.$id)) {
00080             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00081             echo 'alert(\''.__('Item succesfully removed!').'\');';
00082             echo 'self.location.href = \'iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$bid.'\';';
00083             echo '</script>';
00084         } else {
00085             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00086             echo 'alert(\''.__('Item FAILED to removed!').'\');';
00087             echo 'self.location.href = \'iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$bid.'\';';
00088             echo '</script>';
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 // if biblio ID is set
00094 if ($biblioID) {
00095     $table = new simbio_table();
00096     $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="detailTable" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00097 
00098     // database list
00099     $item_q = $dbs->query('SELECT i.item_id, i.item_code, b.title, i.site, loc.location_name, ct.coll_type_name, st.item_status_name FROM item AS i
00100         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00101         LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id
00102         LEFT JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id
00103         LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS st ON i.item_status_id=st.item_status_id
00104         WHERE i.biblio_id='.$biblioID);
00105 
00106     $row = 1;
00107     while ($item_d = $item_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00108         // alternate the row color
00109         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00110 
00111         // links
00112         $edit_link = '<a href="#" onclick="openWin(\'pop_item.php?inPopUp=true&action=detail&biblioID='.$biblioID.'&itemID='.$item_d['item_id'].'\', \'popItem\', 600, 400, true)"
00113             style="text-decoration: underline;">Edit</a>';
00114         $remove_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$biblioID.', '.$item_d['item_id'].')"
00115             style="color: #FF0000; text-decoration: underline;">Delete</a>';
00116         $title = $item_d['item_code'];
00117 
00118         $table->appendTableRow(array($edit_link, $remove_link, $title, $item_d['location_name'], $item_d['site'], $item_d['coll_type_name'], $item_d['item_status_name']));
00119         $table->setCellAttr($row, null, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: auto;"');
00120         $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 5%;"');
00121         $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 10%;"');
00122         $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 40%;"');
00123 
00124         $row++;
00125     }
00126     echo $table->printTable();
00127     // hidden form
00128     echo '<form name="hiddenActionForm" method="post" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'"><input type="hidden" name="bid" value="0" /><input type="hidden" name="remove" value="0" /></form>';
00129 }
00130 /* main content end */
00131 $content = ob_get_clean();
00132 // include the page template
00133 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
00134 ?>
